objectives: Hand over the Gas analyzers to Therapist

title: Operation Aquarius - Part 1
requirements: Must be level 6 to start this quest.
objectives: Find hidden water in the dorm

title: Sanitary Standards - Part 1
requirements: Must be level 4 to start this quest.
objectives: (Optional) Get access to the pumping station at the Factory
Hand over the gas analyzer to Therapist

title: Bad rep evidence
requirements: Must be level 6 to start this quest.
objectives: Find secure folder 0031 in a bunkhouse on Customs
(Optional) Gain access to the closed room in the Factory offices
Hand over secure folder 0031 to Prapor
rewards: Unlocks purchase of Zenit-Belomo PSO 1M2-1 4x24 scope at LL2

title: Stirrup
requirements: Must be level 8 to start this quest.
objectives: Eliminate 4 PMC operators. You must be using pistols
rewards: Kills with the Colt 1911 Currently do not count towards this quest.

title: The Extortionist
requirements: Must be level 7 to start this quest.
objectives: (Optional) Find a place where the messenger hid the item
rewards: 3x Izhmash AK magazine (issued ‘55 or later) 30-round for 7.62x39 AK and compatibles

title: Supplier
requirements: Must be level 5 to start this quest.
objectives: Hand over 4 body armor to Skier
rewards: Unlocks purchase of Saiga-9 9x19 Carbine at LL1

title: Shortage
objectives: Hand over 5 Salewa kits to Therapist

title: Delivery from the past
requirements: Must be level 5 to start this quest.
objectives: Find a secure case in the Tarcone Director's Office at the Customs terminal
Leave the case in the Factory swing room, on 2nd floor of shop 3
rewards: 3x Sb.5 5-round 12/76 magazine for SOK-12 and compatible weapons
Unlocks purchase of 5.45x39 mm PS at LL1

title: Shootout picnic
requirements: Must be level 3 to start this quest.
rewards: 3x 6L20 30-round 5.45x39 magazine for AK-74 and compatible weapons

title: BP depot

title: Checking
